---
name: create-copilot-instructions
agent: Instructions Generator
---
Take the information below and generate an agent instructions [NAME].instructions.md file for it in the /.github/instructions directory. Generate an appropriate name for the [NAME] placeholder based on the content. Make sure instructions are concise, clear and not too long. If no relevant information is provided, ask for clarification. The .md file should have a frontmatter with a description property that informs copilot when to use this instructions file.
